description: Bangladesh, located in South Asia, is known for its lush greenery and extensive network of rivers.
Thailand, in Southeast Asia, is famous for its stunning beaches, ancient temples, and vibrant street life.
Indonesia, the largest archipelago in the world, boasts diverse landscapes, cultures, and wildlife.
Malaysia, a melting pot of cultures, offers modern cities, lush rainforests, and pristine beaches.
Vietnam, in Southeast Asia, is renowned for its rich history, stunning landscapes, and delicious cuisine.
Cambodia, home to the majestic Angkor Wat, is steeped in ancient history and natural beauty.
